thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fallbrook Technologies Announces Voluntary Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Proceedings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fallbrook Technologies Announces Voluntary Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Proceedings
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Fallbrook Technologies Inc:
* ROGER WOOD NAMED CEO AND CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF FALLBROOK TECHNOLOGIES INC AS COMPANY ANNOUNCES VOLUNTARY CHAPTER 11 BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDINGS
* SAYS RELATED TO BANKRUPTCY FILING, ENTERED RESTRUCTURING SUPPORT AGREEMENT WITH SOME OF LARGEST CREDITORS TO SUPPORT PLAN OF REORGANIZATION
* SAYS SUBJECT TO BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVAL, CO HAS AGREEMENT TO SECURE DEBTOR-IN-POSSESSION FINANCING & POST-EXIT FINANCING Source text for Eikon:
